mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crawl_task (source_url, task_source, status, error_code, error_message, article_id, created_at, updated_at, last_run_at) VALUES (#{sourceUrl}, #{taskSource}, #{status}, #{errorCode}, #{errorMessage}, #{articleId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastRunAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE crawl_task SET status = #{status}, error_code = #{errorCode}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, article_id = #{articleId}, last_run_at = #{lastRunAt}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, source_url, task_source, status, error_code, error_message, article_id, created_at, updated_at, last_run_at FROM crawl_task WHERE source_url = #{sourceUrl} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
